title: Mondaiji-tachi ga Isekai kara Kuru Sou desu yo?: Onsen Manyuuki

synonyms: Mondaiji-tachi ga Isekai kara Kuru Sou desu yo? OVA
alternative_titles.en: Problem Children Are Coming from Another World, Aren't They? OVA
alternative_titles.ja: 問題児たちが異世界から来るそうですよ? 〜温泉漫遊記〜

synopsis:
Izayoi, Asuka, and You have been invited to participate in a Gift-Game at a hot spring village to help the small community there find a new water source.

OVA bundled with the eighth volume of the light novel.
